snippet: The Knicks, feeding off Carmelo Anthony, jumped on the Pistons early, by as many as 20 points in the first half, then held off a third-quarter rally.
abstract: New York Knicks defeat Detroit Pistons, 102-87, in front of a sellout crowd in London; Knicks forward Carmelo Anthony scores an exciting 26 points.
lead_paragraph: The Knicks, feeding off Carmelo Anthony, jumped on the Pistons early, by as many as 20 points in the first half, then held off a third-quarter rally.

headline.seo: Carmelo Anthony Leads Knicks Over Pistons in London
headline.main: With Crowd on Their Side, Anthony and the Knicks Romp in London
headline.print_headline: With Crowd on Their Side, Anthony and the Knicks Romp in London
